original_title: The Ballad of Kid Divine: The Cockney Cowboy
overview: The Ballad of Kid Divine: The Cockney Cowboy is a very funny spaghetti western-Peckinpah-Leone pastiche that sees Michael Elphick's charlatan elixir seller, Neil Morrissey and Martin Clunes as the notorious and the not so notorious Irish bounty hunters all in pursuit of Kid Divine (Jesse Birdsall) a baby faced killer with a $25,000 price tag on his head.
tagline: A feast of blood, bullets and beans!
title: The Ballad of Kid Divine: The Cockney Cowboy
